summary: The diff implements most of the requested requirements well. REQ-1 (tagline), REQ-2 (chatbot removal), REQ-3 (legal notice banner), REQ-4 (team section removal), REQ-5 (Cyberabad replacement), REQ-6 (full practice areas), and REQ-7 (Telangana High Court banner) all show clear implementation. However, there are minor gaps: the legal notice banner is dismissible which may undermine 'visible on all pages', the TelanganaHighCourtPage uses a white/black border rather than a gold border as suggested, and there is no true HTTP redirect from the old Cyberabad path. Overall coverage is high.

missing_requirements.requirement: A legal notice/disclaimer banner is visible on the site (top or bottom of all pages)
missing_requirements.reason: The implemented LegalNoticeBanner includes a dismiss button (X) that hides the banner for the session. The AC states the banner should be visible on all pages; a dismissible banner may not satisfy this requirement as users can permanently hide it during their visit.

hallucinated_features.description: Legacy jurisdiction routes added for /jurisdiction/hyderabad, /jurisdiction/secunderabad, and /jurisdiction/rangareddy in addition to the new paths
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only asked to update the Cyberabad route to the new medchal path and ensure the old Cyberabad path redirects. Adding legacy routes for Hyderabad, Secunderabad, and Rangareddy under /jurisdiction/* was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Telangana High Court added as a featured court card/section on the HomePage
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-7 asks for a banner on the Telangana High Court jurisdiction page and navigation accessibility, but does not request a featured highlight section on the HomePage itself.
